author: guitargeek
body:
This PR implements part of the suggestions in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25664 and uses them in RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer as a test bench like usually.

In the end, we probably want to have 4 new member functions of `edm::Event`, as I understood:
  1. to get `T const&` which will throw if no valid product
  2. to get `T const*`
  3. to get `edm::Handle<T>`
  4. to get `edm::Handle<T>` that is has to be valid (throws otherwise)

Here I implemented the `const&` and the normal handle, the functions I personally plan to use a lot.
title: First step in modernizing product retrieval from Event
